title: Establishes the rural homeowners assistance program to assist first time, low or moderate income, or minority homeowners to avoid foreclosure; appropriation
summary: Establishes the rural homeowners assistance program for assisting first time, low or moderate income, or minority homeowners from foreclosure by authorizing and directing the commissioner of state division of housing and community renewal to enter into contracts with neighborhood preservation companies to provide such assistance to residents in certain rural communities; appropriates $1,000,000 for such purposes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing the rural homeowners assistance program and making an appropriation therefor
